item.title: Agressive npcs
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

here is the code i find

//Full NPC Agression- From Zekkalkan- for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { client person = (client)p; if(p != null && person != null) { if(p != null && person != null) { if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY) <= 20 && p.heightLevel == npcs[i].heightLevel) if (npcType == 2745) { npcs[i].StartKilling = person.playerId; npcs[i].RandomWalk = false; npcs[i].IsUnderAttack = true; } else if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY) >= 21 || person.heightLevel != npcs[i].heightLevel) if (npcs[i].npcType == 2745) { npcs[i].RandomWalk = true; } } } }

He says if you are smart enough you would know where to put this, but i dont know where to put, anyone help, lol? he said to put in npc handler, but where in it

Read full topic
